thread.title: Stay like Royalty at Jumeirah Al Qasr, Madinat JumeirahTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: Stay like Royalty at Jumeirah Al Qasr, Madinat JumeirahTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Stay like Royalty at Jumeirah Al Qasr, Madinat JumeirahTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Stay like Royalty at Jumeirah Al Qasr, Madinat Jumeirah Published on : Wednesday, August 19, 2015
Jumeirah Al Qasr “The Palace” invites guests to enjoy complimentary Club benefits on stays of five nights or more. The offer is valid on entry level rooms including theArabian Deluxe or Ocean Deluxe.
The award-winning property is one of the three grand boutique hotels within Madinat Jumeirah, the Arabian Resort of Dubai. Its décor, exquisite service and luxury set the scene for guests to feel like kings and queens.
Guests can book a last minute summer break and enjoy exclusive benefits from Madinat Jumeirah’s Club Executive Lounge and Premium Leisure Club. Complimentary services include pre-dinner drinks and canapés on the Club’s terraces at sunset, daily breakfast in the Club Executive, Premium Leisure Club or private in-room dining, all-day complimentary appetisers, drinks and afternoon tea served in the lounge.
The Club Executive Lounge and Premium Leisure Club’s exclusive features offer an enhanced and memorable stay. Families can take advantage of the Premium Leisure Club with its specially trained team, exclusive check-in and reception, lounge area and spacious outdoor seating. A purpose built playroom and computer room are provided for children’s entertainment.
Guests can relax by the hotel’s swimming pool which is one of the largest temperature controlled pools in the region or be pampered at the award winning Talise Spa. The youngest members of the family can enjoy complimentary hours of fun at Sinbad’s Kids Club and unlimited access to Wild Wadi Waterpark™. Adventurous types can take part in complimentary water sports along Madinat Jumeirah’s two kilometres of private beach or enjoy a workout at Talise Fitness and the indoor pool.
Source:- Jumeirah
